thread.title: 20 NSFW ‘Would You Rather’ Questions That Are Literally Impossible To Answer
thread.title_full: 20 NSFW ‘Would You Rather’ Questions That Are Literally Impossible To Answer

author: Dr. Dakota Fox
title: 20 NSFW ‘Would You Rather’ Questions That Are Literally Impossible To Answer
text:
Pixabay / 947051 There’s nothing like a good “Would You Rather” question to make everyone internally cringe. R/AskMen came up with these 20 questions that will probably make you want to jump out a window.
Some of them are specific to dudes, so ask them to your guy friends to make them give up on life.
1. Would you rather kill a baby with your bare hands, but everyone later thinks your tried to save him/her.
OR Let that baby live, but everyone thinks you tried to kill it.’
2. Would you rather have to watch your parents have sex every night for the rest of your life, or join in once?
3. Would you rather suck a used tampon that you found on the street, or a used condom?
4. Your mother and your girlfriend change bodies, to change them back you have to fuck one of them.
Would you rather fuck your mom with your girlfriends mind or your girlfriend with your moms mind?
5. Would you rather get a good handjob from your grandmother, or a bad handjob from your grandmother?
6. Would you rather be the only sane person in the world, or have omniscience for five minutes and be forever stranded with knowing that you knew the answers to everything but have forgotten them?
7. Fuck a pig live on national television or be responsible for the death of someone.
8. Would you rather eat out your grandmother? Or a homeless person’s butthole?
9. Would you rather wake to the realization that your entire world is the product of your mental breakdown after years of loneliness and isolation or be trapped in a world where no other living thing can interact with you?
10. Have every first bite of pizza you have be really hot, burning your tongue, or never having pizza again.
11. Would you rather have your teeth exchanged for pubes or your pubes exchanged for teeth?
12. Would you rather be in the middle of a human centipede with your dog and your brother or your parents?
13. Would you rather murder your mom or have sex with her so she can live?
14. Would you rather kill an entire kindergarten class with a brick, or take it in the ass from an entire NFL team (including the kicker).
15. Would you rather fuck a 10/10 while your parents watch or a 1/10 in private
16. Would you rather have a piece of shit stuck to your head full time but no smell or a smell of shit off you all the time but no shit on your head
17. Would you rather have you dad walk in on you fucking your dog or have your dog walk in on you fucking your dad?
18. Would you rather have someone give your dick a paper cut perpendicular to the hole, or take a fastball to the crotch?
19. Watch a porno your parents made and masturbate to it, or…… let your parents watch you watch porn whilst you masturbate
20. Would you rather fuck the 20 most beautiful and famous women but they tell everyone were useless/couldn’t get it up or whatever….
Or fuck none of them but there is rumours that you did and you were a stallion.
